name: Dunsparce
flavorText:
When spotted, this
POKéMON escapes
backward by furi­ ously boring into
the ground with
its tail.

previous.name: Forretress
previous.flavorText:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

next.name: Gligar
next.flavorText:
It flies straight
at its target's
face then clamps down on the star­
tled victim to
inject poison.
